text: I like potatoes when they're good! Do you like 'em, too?

branch.text: me too, me too!!! he he he!

branch.decision: well of course I do, old man!
branch.text: me not old man... you mean guy
branch.you: that's how I like you, old man!
branch.text: old man, old man, old man, oooooooooold maaaaaaan!!!

branch.decision: if they're good how would anybody not like them?
branch.you: Well, the concept must have been too difficult for his mind to b.....
I guess you'll never stop surprising me, old man.

branch.decision: well, maybe they're good to me, but not to you, dumbass
branch.you: You could say that, but then again... wait, what did you just call me?!
You say that one more time!
You know what, I'm done talking to you, good bye.
